selections.name: Texas
selections.reason: Bjorn Baker & Tommy Berry combination. Trials have been excellent (2nd, 1st, 3rd) including a win at Warwick Farm. Looks primed for debut.

selections.name: Infant Warrior
selections.reason: Most experienced runner with consistent form (2-2-3). Placed at Kembla last start and maps well.

selections.name: In Circles
selections.reason: Joe Pride debutant who won a recent trial at Warwick Farm. Respect the stable with first starters.

selections.name: Habib Albi
selections.reason: Brad Widdup runner on home track. Trials have been fair, draws well to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Infant Warrior
danger_horse.reason: Race experience is a key advantage here against many first starters.

selections.name: Charka
selections.reason: Godolphin runner coming off a maiden win at Gosford. Drawn perfectly and Berry sticks. Can step up.

selections.name: Gambler
selections.reason: Very consistent (10:1-4-0). Just missed last start at Wyong. Drawn the rails and will be in the finish.

selections.name: Balmain Darling
selections.reason: Resuming. Won maiden well before spell. Two solid trials leading in.

selections.name: Honey Perfume
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed 3 times from 3 starts at this track. Fresh record is okay.

danger_horse.name: Gambler
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form and rail draw make him the logical threat.

selections.name: Cosmic Avenger
selections.reason: Clear top pick on form. Finished 2nd at Kembla last start, narrowly beaten. Third-up and ready to peak.

selections.name: She Can Salsa
selections.reason: Debutant who won a trial at Warwick Farm. Stable can get them ready early.

selections.name: The Prospect
selections.reason: Resuming. Only had one start (5th) but trials have been decent. Watch market.

selections.name: Zougotme
selections.reason: Has shown ability with a placing two starts back. Good draw.

danger_horse.name: She Can Salsa
danger_horse.reason: Trial winner who could be anything on debut.

selections.name: Kokatahi
selections.reason: Waller/Berry combination. Improved significantly to run 2nd last start at Kensington. The one to beat.

selections.name: Indigo Star
selections.reason: Consistent type. 4th last start in a Super Maiden. Drawn well to get a soft run.

selections.name: Derry City Felix
selections.reason: Good 2nd at Kembla last start. Improving with racing.

selections.name: Iron Legend
selections.reason: Resuming Waller runner. Drawn the inside. Watch betting moves.

danger_horse.name: Indigo Star
danger_horse.reason: Metro form lines are strong for this grade.

selections.name: Golden Smile
selections.reason: Last start winner at Beaumont. Kris Lees stable is firing. Proven at the trip.

selections.name: Kahraba
selections.reason: Won well last start at Port Macquarie. Light weight and in form.

selections.name: Think We're There
selections.reason: Consistent. 4th last start at Newcastle. Should be around the mark.

selections.name: Monty Be Quick
selections.reason: 3rd last start at Wyong. Drawn the pole.

danger_horse.name: Kahraba
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form, drops in weight.

selections.name: Johnny
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start at Canterbury. Fit and maps well from barrier 4.

selections.name: Barbarossa
selections.reason: Class runner resuming. Has Group form. Big weight (62kg) is the concern but has the ability.

selections.name: Azarax
selections.reason: Resuming. Won maiden well before spell. Promising type.

selections.name: Shelstein
selections.reason: Drops in grade from BM72. Can improve here.

danger_horse.name: Barbarossa
danger_horse.reason: If he handles the weight, he outclasses this field.

selections.name: Rolling Magic
selections.reason: 4th in BM88 last start is superior form. Drawn barrier 1. The one to beat.

selections.name: Miss Spacegirl
selections.reason: Runner-up in BM78 last start. Very consistent and handles the grade.

selections.name: Oui Oui Oui
selections.reason: Chasing 4 wins in a row. Flying at the moment and must be respected.

selections.name: The Mona Lisa
selections.reason: Resuming. Group 3 placed. Class mare.

danger_horse.name: Miss Spacegirl
danger_horse.reason: Strong metro form lines make her a major threat.

selections.name: Spaceballs
selections.reason: Resuming. Deamer/Clark combo. Has shown ability in better races.

selections.name: Issy's Star
selections.reason: 2nd last start at Beaumont. Kris Lees stable. Improving type.

selections.name: Hazel Jean
selections.reason: Consistent. 3rd last start in BM72. Drops in grade.

selections.name: In Limbo
selections.reason: Won maiden last start. Lightly raced and has upside.

danger_horse.name: Issy's Star
danger_horse.reason: Stable is firing and horse is in form.
